divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving north on route 55 about 15 or 20 miles from route 80. I was goingabout 80 mph when I looked out my side window and noticed something hovering inthe air across the road and back in the field. I said to myself ,that cant beand looked again. Im sure I saw a UFO. The object was hovering above a field atabout a 30 degree angle toward me. I could see daylight between the bottom ofthe UFO and the power lines. Driving in traffic didnt allow another look...Iread in the Chicago paper a few days later about some strange events that day inthe near area and just wnted to add my little part...Sorry Im five years late..
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Joliet
There were no other sightings in Joliet on or around November 30th 1997
Summary: saw saucer shape hovering in air
